scoring_criteria.description: 1-10 scale rating summaries against ground truth

excellent.description: All terms verbatim, no hallucinations, perfect grounding

acceptable.description: Some inaccuracies but core themes correct

functional.pathway_accuracy: Do pathways match KEGG/GO terms verbatim?
functional.theme_grounding: Are themes derived from enrichment data?

phenotype.no_molecular_terms: No genes, proteins, or pathways mentioned?
